thread.title_full: Watch the Oscars Mean Tweets - Watch the Oscars Mean Tweets Edition

author: Mehera Bonner
title: Watch the Oscars Mean Tweets - Watch the Oscars Mean Tweets Edition
text: By Mehera Bonner Feb 26, 2017 Jimmy Kimmel hosted the Oscars , so you better believe he delivered an extra special Mean Tweets just for the show. The late night host rounded up a bunch of A-list actors including Natalie Portman, Eddie Redmayne, Whoopi Goldberg, Felicity Jones, and Emma Stone to read mean tweets from randoms, and there are so many quotables. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
